asp_des: windows server 2008 is the second major release of the windows server family of operating systems for server computers. developed by microsoft, it was released to manufacturing on february 4, 2008, and reached general availability on february 27, 2008. it is the successor of windows server 2003, released nearly five years earlier.

asp_des: an operating system (os) is system software that manages computer hardware and software resources and provides common services for computer programs.
